meanings.definition: A group of nine people or things.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the niner students sat together in a row.
meanings.sent2: The niner crayons in the box were all different colors.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the niner cupcakes disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The niner stars in the sky shone brightly that night.
meanings.sent5: Counting the niner marbles was a fun challenge for the kids.

meanings.definition: A member or supporter of the San Francisco 49ers football team.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is a dedicated niner and never misses a game.
meanings.sent2: The niner cheered loudly when their team scored a touchdown.
meanings.sent3: The little niner fan wore a tiny football helmet to the game.
meanings.sent4: Being a niner means always believing in your team's victory.
meanings.sent5: The niner jerseys filled the stadium with red and gold.
